Back to Home

Hi, I'mSubham

I am an Electrical Engineering student at GIFT College in BBSR, Odisha, India. I am also a front-end web developer and I am proficient in programming languages like Python and Java, code editors like Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, and Microsoft/VSCode, and scripting languages like JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and PHP. I was born in Medinipur, West Bengal, and I am currently living in Kolkata, India.
